name: Lamellar

skills.name: Sacred Flame
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 10% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [HP]

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Crystal Burst

Attacks all enemies. Places a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Diehard
skills.raw_description: Decreases the damage taken by this Champion by 30% HP drops below 30%.
